me.title: About me
me.description: I am a software engineer with a passion for web development. I have experience in building web applications using modern technologies like React, Node.js, and MongoDB. I am always eager to learn new things and improve my skills.

frontend.title: Web development
frontend.description: I build web applications using modern technologies like React, Redux, and TypeScript.

backend.title: Backend development
backend.description: I have experience in building RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express. I have also worked with databases like MongoDB and MySQL.
